Previous: cañcNext: cat

√caṭ (?) 'go'

present: [1.] caṭati etc.  

perfect: cacāṭa  

verbal: caṭita  

secondary: causative: cāṭayati etc.  

derivatives: -cāṭa  -cāṭana C.  -cāṭanīya C.  

Also a late root, perhaps a form of cat; caṭaka E.+, caṭu C., cāṭu C. probably have nothing to do with it.
